name: Obitus
overview: Adventure in a Land of Ruin. Old King Cullen warned his sons that the kingdom of Obitus would fall into evil hands if the Gems of Tranquillity were removed from the tower in the center of the land. Not long after his passing, the king's prophecy came true. Now Obitus is a dark maze riddled with mean creatures and sinister secrets. It's up to you to venture to the corners of the kingdom and recover the Gems so that peace is restored to the land. Your adventure takes place in both first person perspective and side view stages so that you always have the ultimate outlook on the action. Go forth and bring peace to the land. - Battery-backed to save your progress. - First person perspective and side view stages. - More than 12 adventurous areas to explore. - Dozens of weapons and magical items.
